Setting.name: Schedule date for a Last instalment call
Setting.Description: Date at which 'Last Instalment call' can be scheduled

Setting.name: The number of days before last instalment date
Setting.Description: No of days before Last Instalment date that a customer can be considered for Last instalment call

Setting.name: Days since the Customer made the last payment to be considered as an Inactive Credit/Cash customer
Setting.Description: The number of days since the Customer made the last payment to be considered as an inactive credit/cash customer

Setting.name: Days since the last call to a Customer to be considered as an Inactive Credit/Cash customer
Setting.Description: The number of days since the last call for a Customer to be considered as an inactive credit/cash customer

Setting.name: Schedule the call to a date X days after today for inactive customers
Setting.Description: The number of days ahead to schedule a call to an inactive customer

Setting.name: No of Days to get a date prior to which all unmade calls can be flushed
Setting.Description: No of days to get a date prior to which all unmade calls will be flushed

Setting.name: Previous Calls to display
Setting.Description: Number of previous calls to display in the Call Log page when logging a call.

Setting.name: No of days since SR is open
Setting.Description: How many days an SR must be unresolved and not closed to appear in Slow SR list

Setting.name: Sales Follow-up Threshold
Setting.Description: Amount of the sales order (aggrement total for credit and total sale value for cash sales) for customer to be added to the sales follow-up list
